note.p: Estonian nobleman. Baron de Rosen. Also known as Hans Robert Otto Friedrich von Rosen. Elder brother of Theophile (or Gottlieb) Reinhold William de Rosen. Married Maria Justina Rigby (1808–89), a cousin of Maria Hooker, Joseph Dalton Hooker’s mother, in Framingham Earl, Norfolk, in 1830; separated by 1848.
Genealogisches Handbuch der baltischen Ritterschaften Estland 1 pt 2: 224–5
Norfolk, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1936 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 August 2022)
